variables.checked:
route-target import 2828:92
address-family ipv4
export map SET-VPN-CONNECT-COMM
exit-address-family

variables.label: Did you log BGP password into key respository

snippets.text:
{{ ! 
 interface Serial <<serial_interface3>> 
description "<<PSR>>:<<NSR>>:<<CKTID3>>:<<CUST_NAME>>" 
 mtu 1590 
 no ip address 
 no ip redirects 
 encapsulation ppp 
 ppp multilink 
 ppp multilink group <<multilink_group>> 
 ppp multilink fragment size 1590 }}

{{ ! 
 interface Serial <<serial_interface4>> 
description "<<PSR>>:<<NSR>>:<<CKTID4>>:<<CUST_NAME>>" 
 mtu 1590 
 no ip address 
 no ip redirects 
 encapsulation ppp 
 ppp multilink 
 ppp multilink group <<multilink_group>> 
 ppp multilink fragment size 1590 }}
{{ ip verify unicast source reachable-via rx }}
